Name: Different Color
RuleDesc: Connecting two different-color tiles grants 2 points.

Name: Same Color
RuleDesc: Connecting two same-color tiles grants 2 points per tile connected.

Name: Different-Color Double
RuleDesc: Different-color tiles connected to this tile will have their final score x2.

Name: Same-Color Double
RuleDesc: Same-color tiles connected to this tile will have their final score x2.
